game.title: The Lost Sword
game.description: The legendary sword that was lost a hundred years ago has reappeared. The quest giver, Eldwin the Wise, has requested you to find and retrieve this lost artifact.
game.reward: 5000 gold coins and a special item

task.description: Go to the Old Ruins, located North of the town, and look for clues about the lost sword.
task.location: Old Ruins, North of the town

task.description: Enter the Dark Dungeon beneath the old ruins and defeat the guardian to access the legendary sword.
task.location: Dark Dungeon, Beneath the old ruins

task.description: After defeating the guardian, find and retrieve the legendary sword in the Inner Sanctum of the dungeon.
